title: ...remember us?
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:pride-highlighter |inc-s9-plgbt= --]]]
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

Can you [[span style="text-shadow: Gainsboro 5px 5px;"]]remember?[[/span]]
[[>]]
Remember what?
[[/>]]
Anything.
[[>]]
I’m not sure...

I’ll try.
[[/>]]
Do you [[span style="text-shadow: gainsboro 4px 4px;"]]remember[[/span]] [[span style="text-shadow: silver 4px 4px, lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px;"]]me?[[/span]]
[[>]]
No.

But your face is familiar.

Please don’t look away.
[[/>]]
I won’t.

Do you remember how we first met?

Do you remember the [[span style="color: goldenrod; text-shadow: gold 1px 1px, yellow 2px 2px;"]]sunlight?[[/span]]

[[>]]
No.
[[/>]]
No?
[[>]]
It was [[span style="color: black; text-shadow: white 1px 0px, white 0px 1px, white -1px 0px, white 0px -1px, gray 4px 4px, dimgray -2px 0px, darkgray -3px 1px, lightslategray -4px -3px, lightgray 3px -3px, silver -4px 3px;"]]overcast.[[/span]]

Mostly. [[span style="color: black; text-shadow: white 1px 0px, white 0px 1px, white -1px 0px, white 0px -1px, gray 4px 4px, dimgray -2px 0px, darkgray -3px 1px, lightslategray -4px -3px, lightgray 3px -3px, silver -4px 3px;"]]Until a[[/span]] [[span style="color: goldenrod; text-shadow: gold 1px 1px, yellow 2px 2px;"]]break[[/span]] [[span style="color: black; text-shadow: white 1px 0px, white 0px 1px, white -1px 0px, white 0px -1px, gray 4px 4px, dimgray -2px 0px, darkgray -3px 1px, lightslategray -4px -3px, lightgray 3px -3px, silver -4px 3px;"]]in the clouds.[[/span]]
[[/>]]
...You’re right.

The sun was just how I felt.

Poetic.

Or maybe just stupid.
[[>]]
You don't seem stupid to me.
[[/>]]
Anything else?
[[>]]
I remember wind.

...But it wasn’t windy.

I remember hearing wind. Wind in the words.
[[/>]]
[[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px;"]]Zephyr.[[/span]] You heard [[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px;"]]Zephyr.[[/span]]
[[>]]
That’s your name isn’t it?
[[/>]]
Yes.
[[>]]
Pleasure to make your acquaintance.
[[/>]]
You said that then, too.

Such an interesting turn of phrase.
[[>]]
Weird?
[[/>]]
Maybe a little. But mostly just interesting.

I knew you'd be interesting.

Do you [[span style="text-shadow: silver 4px 3px;"]]remember[[/span]] //your// name?
[[>]]
My name...

...I only remember [[span style="color: black; text-shadow: white 1px 0px, white 0px 1px, white -1px 0px, white 0px -1px, gray 4px 4px, dimgray -2px 0px, darkgray -3px 1px, lightslategray -4px -3px, lightgray 3px -3px, silver -4px 3px, royalblue -3px 10px, royalblue 10px 15px, royalblue -9px 27px;"]]clouds,[[/span]] [[span style="color: goldenrod; text-shadow: gold 1px 1px, yellow 2px 2px, lightblue -3px 13px, lightblue 10px 21px;"]]light bursting[[/span]] [[span style="color: black; text-shadow: white 1px 0px, white 0px 1px, white -1px 0px, white 0px -1px, gray 4px 4px, dimgray -2px 0px, darkgray -3px 1px, lightslategray -4px -3px, lightgray 3px -3px, silver -4px 3px, royalblue -3px 10px, royalblue 10px 15px, royalblue -9px 27px;"]]through the rain.[[/span]]
@@@@
@@@@
Wait.

That's not all.

Light bursting through to make...

a [[span style="color: blueviolet; text-shadow: blue 0px -1px, springgreen 0px -2px, gold 0px -3px, orange 0px -4px, red 0px -5px;"]]rainbow.[[/span]]

Does that have something to do with my name?

[[span style="color: blueviolet; text-shadow: blue 0px -1px, springgreen 0px -2px, gold 0px -3px, orange 0px -4px, red 0px -5px;"]]Rainbow?[[/span]]

That doesn't sound right...
[[/>]]
No, it doesn't.
[[>]]
But...

it [[span style="text-shadow: lavender 0px -1px, lightcyan 0px -2px, honeydew 0px -3px, lightyellow 0px -4px, antiquewhite 0px -5px, mistyrose 0px -6px;"]]//means//[[/span]] [[span style="color: blueviolet; text-shadow: blue 0px -1px, springgreen 0px -2px, gold 0px -3px, orange 0px -4px, red 0px -5px;"]]rainbow.[[/span]]

Doesn't it?
[[/>]]
It does.

[[span style="text-shadow: lavender 0px -1px, lightcyan 0px -2px, honeydew 0px -3px, lightyellow 0px -4px, antiquewhite 0px -5px, mistyrose 0px -6px;"]]Enfys.[[/span]]
[[>]]
[[span style="text-shadow: lavender 0px -1px, lightcyan 0px -2px, honeydew 0px -3px, lightyellow 0px -4px, antiquewhite 0px -5px, mistyrose 0px -6px;"]]Enfys...[[/span]]

I chose it.
[[/>]]
Yes.

You did.

I always thought it was so clever.
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
What else?

Anything else you [[span style="text-shadow: silver 3px 3px;"]]remember?[[/span]]
[[>]]
About [[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px;"]]you?[[/span]]

Or about [[span style="text-shadow: lavender 0px -1px, lightcyan 0px -2px, honeydew 0px -3px, lightyellow 0px -4px, antiquewhite 0px -5px, mistyrose 0px -6px;"]]me?[[/span]]
[[/>]]
About anything.
[[>]]
...Don't look away.
[[/>]]
I'm not going to.
[[>]]
I [[span style="text-shadow: silver 3px 3px;"]]remember...[[/span]] something.

Something about [[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px;"]]you.[[/span]]
[[/>]]
Yes?
[[>]]
Your face.

You were smiling.
[[/>]]
I was?
[[>]]
I remember

[[span style="color: lightcoral; text-shadow: peachpuff -5px 4px, saddlebrown -3px 8px;"]]ice cream.[[/span]]
[[/>]]
What?
[[>]]
[[span style="color: lightcoral; text-shadow: peachpuff -5px 7px, saddlebrown -3px 14px;"]]Neapolitan ice cream.[[/span]]

[[span style="color: chocolate;"]]{{@@Dripping all the way@@}}
{{@@  down to the very  @@}}
{{@@    end of your    @@}}
{{@@      waffle       @@}}
{{@@        cone        @@}}[[/span]]
[[/>]]
I understand now. 

You're close.
[[>]]
I'm wrong?

But I [[span style="text-shadow: darkgray 3px 3px;"]]remember...[[/span]]

//my// waffle cone had [[span style="color: lightcoral; text-shadow: peachpuff -5px 4px, saddlebrown -3px 8px;"]]neapolitan.[[/span]]

But you had one too.
[[/>]]
Yes, I did.

We didn't agree on flavors.
[[>]]
We didn't...

Wait.

Eugh!
[[/>]]
What?
[[>]]
Who gets [[span style="color: palevioletred; text-shadow: lightgreen 5px 4px, saddlebrown 3px 8px;"]]spumoni?[[/span]]
[[/>]]
Heh, I do.
[[>]]
You're twisted.
[[/>]]
Must be.
[[>]]
Eating [[span style="color: palevioletred; text-shadow: lightgreen 5px 4px, saddlebrown 3px 8px;"]]spumoni[[/span]] with a smile on your face.

Like a complete lunatic.

It made your hand sticky.
[[/>]]
It did. It made my hand very sticky.
[[>]]
...But I held it anyway.
[[/>]]
You did.

It made your hand sticky, too.

Do you want to stop there for today?
[[>]]
No.

I want to keep going.
[[/>]]
Are you sure?

I don't want to push you.

You've been through enough.
[[>]]
I want to [[span style="text-shadow: darkgray 2px 3px;"]]remember.[[/span]]
[[/>]]
Okay.

What do you want to [[span style="text-shadow: darkgray 3px 2px;"]]remember?[[/span]]

There's a lot to recover.
[[>]]
Please don't look away.
[[/>]]
I'm not planning on it.
[[>]]
I remember a dark room.

[[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px;"]]You[[/span]] and [[span style="text-shadow: lavender 0px -1px, lightcyan 0px -2px, honeydew 0px -3px, lightyellow 0px -4px, antiquewhite 0px -5px, mistyrose 0px -6px;"]]me.[[/span]]

Another burst of light.

But not the sun...

A television.

A movie.

We were watching a movie.

An animated one.
[[/>]]
//Lilo and Stitch.//
[[>]]
Is it a good film?
[[/>]]
Your favorite.

And truthfully, mine as well.
[[>]]
We should watch it.
[[/>]]
...I'd really like that.
[[>]]
...What were we...?

Right.

We were watching the film.

I had fallen asleep.

I woke up.

You were playing with my hair.
[[/>]]
It was very soft.
[[>]]
I liked it.
[[/>]]
You said as much.
[[>]]
I liked your smile.
[[/>]]
...
[[>]]
I [[span style="text-shadow: darkgray 2px 2px;"]]remember[[/span]] your lips on mine.
[[/>]]
...Yes. That's

that's right.

Apologies, it seems I didn't get as much sleep as I'd hoped. Didn't mean to yawn in your face.
[[>]]
...I'm sorry.
[[/>]]
What?

Why?
[[>]]
This is really hard for you, isn't it?
[[/>]]
Well
@@@@
@@@@
yes
@@@@
@@@@
but
@@@@
@@@@
...I think I'd prefer this over the alternative.

We can stop if you want.
[[>]]
Is that what you want?
[[/>]]
I want whatever you want.
[[>]]
Then I want to [[span style="text-shadow: gray 2px 2px;"]]remember[[/span]] [[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px;"]]you.[[/span]]
[[/>]]
Okay.

Any other memories to pull at?

Or would you like me to guide you?
[[>]]
You weren't very good at that last time.
[[/>]]
What?
[[>]]
I [[span style="text-shadow: gray 2px 2px;"]]remember[[/span]] [[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px;"]]you[[/span]] and [[span style="text-shadow: lavender 0px -1px, lightcyan 0px -2px, honeydew 0px -3px, lightyellow 0px -4px, antiquewhite 0px -5px, mistyrose 0px -6px;"]]me.[[/span]]

[[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px, lavender 0px -1px, lightcyan 0px -2px, honeydew 0px -3px, lightyellow 0px -4px, antiquewhite 0px -5px, mistyrose 0px -6px;"]]Us.[[/span]]

Don't look away?
[[/>]]
I promise.

Go on.
[[>]]
We were walking in a [[span style="color: SaddleBrown; text-shadow: sienna 0px -6px, olive 0px -10px, saddlebrown 0px -14px, chocolate 0px -18px, sienna 0px -22px, darkolivegreen 0px -26px, darkgreen -12px -20px, darkgreen -1px -27px, darkgreen 16px -24px, forestgreen -14px -30px, forestgreen 0px -35px, forestgreen 15px -34px, mediumseagreen -10px -28px, mediumseagreen 2px -31px, mediumseagreen 18px -29px, limegreen -17px -38px, limegreen -4px -45px, limegreen 15px -41px;"]]forest.[[/span]]
[[/>]]
Oh.
[[>]]
You were a bad guide. We got lost.

It started [[span style="color: black; text-shadow: white 1px 0px, white 0px 1px, white -1px 0px, white 0px -1px, gray 4px 4px, dimgray -2px 0px, darkgray -3px 1px, lightslategray -4px -3px, lightgray 3px -3px, silver -4px 3px, royalblue -3px 10px, royalblue 10px 15px, royalblue -9px 27px;"]]raining,[[/span]] but we kept going.
@@@@
@@@@
...Something bad happened, didn't it?
[[/>]]
Yes.

Something really bad.

And you had a choice. I had one, too.
[[>]]
Did you make the right one?
[[/>]]
I hope so.

For your sake.
[[>]]
We can stop now.
[[/>]]
Are you sure?
[[>]]
We can try again later.

Maybe watch //Lilo and Stitch//. That might help.
[[/>]]
Yeah.
[[>]]
I have time.

Right?
[[/>]]
Yes. You have all the time in the world.

If you're certain you want to stop now.
[[>]]
I just don't want to see you sad.

I like it when you smile.
[[/>]]
...So then.

Tomorrow?
[[>]]
Wait.

There's one more thing I [[span style="text-shadow: slategray 1px 1px;"]]remember.[[/span]]
[[/>]]
Oh?
[[>]]
Something I brought that day.
@@@@
@@@@
A@@   @@[[span style="text-shadow: silver 0px 10px, silver 10px 0px, silver 0px -10px, silver -10px 0px, silver 5px 5px, silver -5px -5px, silver -5px 5px, silver 5px -5px, lightblue 0px -16px, skyblue 1px -15px;"]]ring.[[/span]]
[[/>]]
...What?
[[>]]
I may not remember [[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px, lavender 0px -1px, lightcyan 0px -2px, honeydew 0px -3px, lightyellow 0px -4px, antiquewhite 0px -5px, mistyrose 0px -6px;"]]us.[[/span]]

But I know things make sense when I see [[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px;"]]you.[[/span]] And that gives me a better understanding of [[span style="text-shadow: lavender 0px -1px, lightcyan 0px -2px, honeydew 0px -3px, lightyellow 0px -4px, antiquewhite 0px -5px, mistyrose 0px -6px;"]]me.[[/span]] 

And I want nothing more than to make you happy.

I want to [[span style="text-shadow: slategray 1px 0px;"]]remember[[/span]] [[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px;"]]you.[[/span]] I want to [[span style="text-shadow: slategray 0px 1px;"]]remember[[/span]] [[span style="text-shadow: lightcyan -1px -1px, azure -2px -2px, lavender 0px -1px, lightcyan 0px -2px, honeydew 0px -3px, lightyellow 0px -4px, antiquewhite 0px -5px, mistyrose 0px -6px;"]]us.[[/span]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
...Promise you won't look away?
[[/>]]
Never.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box]]
[!-- N/A (No Images)  --]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box-end]]
author: Oboebandgeek99
